message.body: ######## just wanted to give you a heads up that we're scheduled to arrive around 7:30pm. Interested in getting dinner then?
If so then yes, dinner will be nice.
Sweet! Yes, it's Sarah :) our friend recommends Abyssinia on 45th, perhaps you know it?
She said there used to be really good tunes upstairs on Thurs. so we were thinking of checking it out, but we'll touch base when we arrive :)
Yeah I go there all the time, it's good.
